<h2><em>Collection Displays Wang&#8217;s Trademark Flowing Fabrics And Limited Color Palette </em></h2>
<p><a href="http://www.jingdaily.com/kaizhi/jing/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/394420_268407043217304_138150749576268_760159_1762810468_n.jpg"><img class="alignright size-thumbnail wp-image-13377" title="394420_268407043217304_138150749576268_760159_1762810468_n" src="http://www.jingdaily.com/kaizhi/jing/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/394420_268407043217304_138150749576268_760159_1762810468_n-150x150.jpg" alt="394420_268407043217304_138150749576268_760159_1762810468_n" width="5" height="5" /></a>Young Beijing-based designer, <a href="http://www.vegawang.com/" target="_blank">Vega Zaishi Wang</a> (王在实), one of <a href="http://www.jingdaily.com/en/luxury/chinese-creativity-who-are-the-emerging-designers/" target="_blank">Jing Daily’s favorite emerging Chinese designers</a>, is quickly establishing herself as one of the most innovative and interesting figures in China’s burgeoning home-grown fashion scene. Since returning to China from London in 2008, following her graduation from Central Saint Martins College of Art &amp; Design, Wang quickly got to work building her eponymous brand, which officially launched in August 2010. Wang’s first boutique, a <a href="http://www.stylites.net/2010/08/12/vega-wang-2/" target="_blank">combination workshop/storefront</a> located in Beijing’s Jianwai Soho, has seen no shortage of attention from local Beijing media and fashion elites, and in less than a year Wang has become a favorite among celebrities like actress <a href="http://www.jingdaily.com/en/culture/actress-fan-bingbing-is-red-hot-in-esquire-china-photos/" target="_blank">Fan Bingbing</a>.</p>
<p>Taking a distinctly different approach than <a href="http://www.jingdaily.com/en/luxury/designer-vega-wang-i-want-to-stand-at-the-forefront-of-fashion/" target="_blank">last year&#8217;s &#8220;Cape&#8221; collection</a>, which centered on dramatic, flowing pieces in bold blues and reds, recently Wang debuted her S/S 2012 collection, &#8220;Like a Piece of Her.&#8221; Featuring pieces in a restrained palette of navy blue, black, cream and rich red, the collection is at once more angular, tailored and still playful than other recent collections. Come next spring, we wouldn&#8217;t be surprised to see these designs worn by China&#8217;s more fashion-forward types.</p>
<div id="attachment_13378" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 510px"><a href="http://www.jingdaily.com/kaizhi/jing/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/409682_268386793219329_138150749576268_760074_187582182_n.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-13378" title="409682_268386793219329_138150749576268_760074_187582182_n" src="http://www.jingdaily.com/kaizhi/jing/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/409682_268386793219329_138150749576268_760074_187582182_n.jpg" alt="Vega Zaishi Wang S/S 2012 Collection: &quot;Like a Piece of Her&quot;" width="500" height="651" /></a><p class="wp-caption-text">Vega Zaishi Wang S/S 2012 Collection: &quot;Like a Piece of Her&quot;</p></div>
<div id="attachment_13379" class="wp-caption aligncenter" style="width: 510px"><a href="http://www.jingdaily.com/kaizhi/jing/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/397493_268386843219324_138150749576268_760075_752063853_n.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-13379" title="397493_268386843219324_138150749576268_760075_752063853_n" src="http://www.jingdaily.com/kaizhi/jing/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/397493_268386843219324_138150749576268_760075_752063853_n.jpg" alt="Vega Zaishi Wang S/S 2012 Collection: &quot;Like a Piece of Her&quot;" width="500" height="651" /></a><p class="wp-caption-text">Vega Zaishi Wang S/S 2012 Collection: &quot;Like a Piece of Her&quot;</p></div>

<p>Check out the entire S/S 2012 collection on <a href="http://www.vegawang.com/collection06.asp" target="_blank">Vega Zaishi Wang&#8217;s official website</a>.</p>

  for( var p in param ){
    temp.push(p + '=' + encodeURIComponent( param[p] || '' ) )
